mc_user_reviews.text: Ali Larter was good but the movie fails to give heat or tention or even be a thriller. Not even as trilling as the movies they play on lifetime or LMN. But otherwise this is an alright movie. I'm not saying it is terrible but it should have been better.

horrible movie; this story could have been way better. They did a horrible job with the script . If you expected to watch a thriller movie don't watch this movie. it just so bad. It gets worst and worst . This is beyonce worst movie.
One of the worst movies ever made. I wish I could give this rotten pile of excrement a  negative 1000000000 as a score. This movie is pure filth and the people responsible should be punished.

Well, the movie has two amazing woman, BeyoncÃ© and Ali Larter. BeyoncÃ©'s performance really surprised me and Ali's was good as always. I didn't think the movie is great, screenplay wasn't original, I already had seen many movies like this but I enjoyed a lot the fight at the end. It's a decent movie.

THIS movie had sooooooooo much potential, but i hate to say it but Beyonce really ruined this movie for me. Singers becoming actors just doesn't work, i mean look at Mariah Carey and Chris Brown. They really shoulda casted Taraji .P. Henson for Beyonce's role. She woulda gave that character some life. Idris and Ali Larter were good and their roles but they shoulda expanded more on why she was OBSSESSED with him to begin with.
The movie is filled with cliches all over the place and yet still can be entertaining at times because of the somewhat intense scene setups. Beyonce is embarrassing
It kills me to say that this movie wasn't all that bad. It was pretty damn tense. It might have been unintentionally funny at times, but it was still creepy. The main girl was a total psycho.

I'll admit that I probably like this film more for the fact that it has Beyoncé playing a badass black woman trying to get her revenge, but overall it's quite an entertaining and thrilling film. Props to the two leading ladies as well as Idris Elba who is between them. It's a type of film that has been done before, but I personally don't think this well. It didn't get the best of reviews, but I quite liked it right to the very end with that rather forceful girl-on-girl fight!

I love Ali Larter Beyonce and Idris Alba each is convincing in their individual parts so if you are a fan watch it. But as a movie it never takes it to the next level or goes into the grey area. Each actor plays their stock character well but the story never explores anyone back story nobody has a skeletons no plot twists nothing. Ali does a great jobs as one of America most underexposed actresses Beyonce and Alba were good but it was just so flat.
